Package tools.gui

Class EditField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextField
              • tools.gui.EditField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    public class EditField
extends javax.swing.JTextField
    Text field class which allows changing the color of the border when invalid text is entered.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void forceClearError()
